title: Adventuring in conservation
creator_credit: Indiana University and American Camping Association
brief_description: Shows boys and girls as they discover the interdependence of plants and animals in nature’s communities. How man destroys or upsets these communities; the importance of natural resources and what we can do to conserve them; camping practices which will help conserve natural resources.
